metadata.title: CVE-2023-52744 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/irdma: Fix potential NULL-ptr-dereference in_dev_get() can return NULLwhich will cause a failure once idev is dereferenced inin_dev_for_each_ifa_rtnl(). This patch adds a check for NULL value in idevbeforehand. Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) withSVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
